results.title: Removing or installing a compressor or condenser
results.creator_credit: Frederick K Rockett and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Refrigeration Service”.
Common cooling unit disorders in a domestic refrigerator; how to evacuate valved evaporators; remove an oil-logged evaporator; install the evaporator; and install a direct expansion cooling unit.

results.title: Action for children's television: kids for sale
results.creator_credit: Yale Marc, Jim Herzig and Cinema Graphics
results.brief_description: Provides an analysis of some of the critical issues concerning children and television. Examines the role of broadcasters and advertisers, with particular reference to the types of programs selected for transmission and the nature of the commercials shown. Finally, viewers are challenged to take an active role in improving children’s television. Suitable for upper secondary, tertiary and teacher levesl.

results.title: Acrobats of God (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Dave Wilson, H Poindexter and Martha Graham Centre for Contemporary Dance
results.brief_description: Presents Martha Graham and her company in a dance performance which celebrates the trials, discipline, denials, glories, and delights of a dancer’s world. Choreography by Martha Graham. Music by Carlos Surinach.

results.title: Achimota
results.creator_credit: John Page and British Ministry of Information
results.brief_description: Shows the introduction of higher education to West Africa, Nigeria and the Gold Coast in the early part of the 20th century with the establishment of Achimota College, Gold Cast. Emphasises the need for preserving valuable elements of the African culture. Conversely however, ends up reinforcing the dominance of the western way of life over Africans under colonial rule. Commentary by Dr Julian Huxley.

results.title: Selection of dimensions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Engineering Drawing”

Introduces the principles which govern the choice of dimensions. These principles are shown to be based on two factors: (1) the functional characteristics of the object, which includes consideration of the accuracy demanded and the relation of the portion to other elements of the unit or machine; and (2) the manufacturing methods used in making the object.

results.title: Sections and conventions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Engineering Drawing”

Explains why sectioning in engineering drawing is often necessary, and describes the various types of sectional views and the special language used.

results.title: According to plan
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Engineering Drawing”.
The aim of this film is to help the beginning student to get started on the right track in their thinking about engineering drawing. It tackles this objective partly through an emotional appeal based on the combined stimulation of emotion, sight and sounds, and partly on the development of the simple theme “modern production requires that many people work together on a single project”. To do this they need a language, a means of communication, so that their work can be co-ordinated. This language is engineering drawing.
